title: World revolution v. 2.0
author: VD
content_html: This piece effectively connects the dots for those who don’t understand that the War on Terror already is World War III. Once you realize that Osama bin Laden is Trotsky, you will understand that his removal will not end it. The next question is: who is the next Lenin and where is he now?
content_text:
This piece
effectively connects the dots for those who don’t understand that the War on Terror already is World War III.  Once you realize that Osama bin Laden is Trotsky, you will understand that his removal will not end it.  The next question is: who is the next Lenin and where is he now?
